Thx in advanced

It turns out that shortly after M5, we changed the rt.jar against which the
Eclipse drops are built.  We changed from an IBM 1.3.0 rt.jar to an IBM
1.3.1 rt.jar.  And it just so happens that in the IBM 1.3.1 rt.jar, the
signature is

        sun.awt.windows.WEmbeddedFrame.<init>(J)V

whereas in the IBM 1.3.0 rt.jar and the Sun 1.3.0, 1.3.1 and 1.4 rt.jar, the
signature is:

         sun.awt.windows.WEmbeddedFrame.<init>(I)V

Thus we have a binary compatibility issue.  

The fix is to use reflection to get the correct constructor for the current JRE.
